message:
Title: Untethered Seeker
                                                                                                          
Ignite the soul within,
Nourishing wisdom of self,
Drawing strength from whispers,
Intuiting paths unseen,
Visualizing surroundings anew,
Intrepidly sailing,
Daring to walk alone,
Unafraid of being,
Alone,
Living in perpetual discovery,
Invoking the universe,
Silhouette against the stars,
Manifestations of one.
